thread.title: Bomb Charge Added Against Man Who Threatened Christmas Terror Attack

author: wsjcom
title: Bomb Charge Added Against Man Who Threatened Christmas Terror Attack
text:
SACRAMENTO, Calif.—A federal grand jury indicted a California man on charges of plotting to use homemade bombs during a Christmas Day attack on San Francisco’s Pier 39.
Everitt Aaron Jameson allegedly intended to use pipe bombs to force people into an area of the popular tourist destination to shoot them, according to the indictment.
